page.title: 18THE PEOPLE OF OADBY
page.content: As a result of Oadby being a mixture of an old village and new estates, people of all ages live in Oadby. There are young children at school, older children at college, parents at home or work and senior citizens.{A {champion Town Crier}lives in Oadby. He has been all over the world to enter competions and give demonstra- tions. In 1984 he won the world championship in Canada. He cries and gives talks mostly for charity, and enjoys it because he meets so many people.{A world class snooker player, Willie Thorne,lives in Oadby, and owns his own club in Leicester, where other people can practise. He enters competions at home and abroad. He has won three finals in this country and one international competion. He was recently married at St. Peter's Church in the village.
